sentences.sentence: Now, new research might give goalies the upper hand.
sentences.translation: 不过现在，新的研究成果或许可以帮上守门员一忙。

sentences.sentence: More than 80 percent of the time, even the best goalies guess wrong.
sentences.translation: 就算是世界上就最好的守门员，在扑点球时超过80%的时候都是判断错误的。

sentences.sentence: I believe this team's goal may be kept by academy goalies for years to come.
sentences.translation: 我相信这支球队的目标可能是在未来几年保持学院守门员。
